data.meta_description: Candlewick Press, based in Somerville, Massachusetts, publishes outstanding childrenï¿½s books for readers of all ages. Since we first opened our doors in 1991, weï¿½ve received more than 300 accolades and honors, and have been named the fastest growing childrenï¿½s publisher in the U.S. by Publishers Weekly.
data.text:
King Lion

Why does everyone run away whenever this lonely beast roars HELLO! at them? A story about the art of making friendsand the bravery of one kind little girl. A Boy, His Dog, and the Sea

A boy and his dog head to the beach and find that appearances can be deceiving in this story of an unexpected hero from former British Childrens Laureate Anthony Browne. Birth of the Bicycle: A Bumpy History of the Bicycle in America 18191900

Three cheers for the birth of the bicycle! Hop on for a jaunty, rhythmic ride through a playfully illustrated history.
